sentences.sContent: That should be all the incentive you need.
sentences.sContent_eng: That should be all the incentive you need.
sentences.sCn: 这应该是你所需要的全部激励。

sentences.sContent: We have no objection if this prize is an incentive to reverse the warmongering and unilateral policies of the previous US administration and if this encourages a policy based on just peace.
sentences.sContent_eng: We have no objection if this prize is an incentive to reverse the warmongering and unilateral policies of the previous US administration and if this encourages a policy based on just peace.
sentences.sCn: 如果这个奖项是为了激励美国改变前政府穷兵黩武的习惯和单边政策，为了激励一个仅建立于和平基础上的政策，那我们并不反对。

phrases.pCn: 经济激励，经济刺激；经济诱因
激励相容；剌激的协调性
奖金，奖励津贴；奖励工资，激励工资

remMethod.val: in(进入) + cent( = cant， 唱) + ive(形容词后缀) → 把(力量)唱进去 → 鼓励

trans.tranOther: something that encourages you to work harder, start a new activity etc
